title: I replaced my Meta Ray-Bans with smart glasses that truly lasted all day - but there's a catch
contentSnippet: The Solos AirGo A5 smart glasses sacrifice camera support and rich audio for more battery life compared to their competitors. Was it worth it?
content: The Solos AirGo A5 smart glasses sacrifice camera support and rich audio for more battery life compared to their competitors. Was it worth it?
